website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensively protect your MacBook investment from dust, spills, and crumbs, all while adding color, artistry, and comfort to the laptop's keyboard.
pros: Over a dozen color options available
Laptop closes securely with skin in place
Doesn't leave a residue on the keys or on the screen
Fits snugly and muffles the sound of typing
there’s a hole for the cap's lock light
cons: Keys' edges will light in the dark, but letters, numbers, and symbols do not light up
Color wears eventually with use and if cleaned frequently

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: For some odd reason I haven't been able to find a keyboard cover that fits my computer until now. I can't express how happy I am with this. If your someone with a newer model mac and you're think about buying a keyboard cover I recommend you don't hesitate because newer model macs use something called butterfly mechanism for they're keyboards now and that basically makes them super easy to break because of a little bit of dust and super hard to clean. It doesn't help that the cost to repair a mac keyboard (even if its just one key) is stupidly expensive. So don't hesitate to spend this little bit to save a lot later down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but prevented wake from Sleep Mode.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard cover was beautiful, and I liked it, BUT, I leave the keyboard cover on my MacBook Pro while it is put to sleep, and when I would try to wake it from sleep, I had to take the keyboard cover off and then close the computer and then open it up to get it to wake from sleep. So, for me, a clear keyboard cover works best - The Seller (Top Case) was Amazing and Wonderful to help me to get the clear Keyboard cover that works best for me.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: slips round too much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my macbook pro, knowing I would have to cut off the top row to see the touchbar. No big deal. But even when this cover was new and whole, it does not allow for easy visualization of the keyboard. And it slips around so much that it makes typing difficult; I often type the wrong letter as the it may slide to the left or right and cover a different letter than is printed on it. Moisture collects underneath it so it only protects the keyboard from dirty fingers. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: CAVEAT EMPTOR
customer_reviews.text: The product looks as good as any other, good price, durability, ease of cleaning, but the description did not sufficiently warn an ignoramus such as myself that there are now two different Mac keyboards. I didn't know, I wasn't looking for distinctions ("no touch bar" means nothing to me), I bought three packs of the wrong thing. Not enough money lost to go through the hassle of exchanging, but won't buy from Top Case again. Fool me once.... My replacements were from a company who actually took the trouble to email me a warning about the various keyboards, each illustrated, to make sure that I knew what I'd bought and had ordered the right kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits really nice but color fades pretty fast on frequently used keys
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this as a replacement for the one that came with the case I bought was too big. This one is a perfect fit and letters match with keyboard 100%. Also, love the color ----------- Update. So pretty soon after purchasing the A and Space bar coloring started to wear off. Not the end of the world but not as aesthetically pretty as before. Still fits nicely
customer_reviews.author: lili u

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. The ombre towards the bottom of the keyboard is not exactly white but just more a lighter blue. The cover comes off fairly easily, and fits most of the time. The only downside is for some reason, it keeps leaving marks on my laptop screen. The marks come off when I rub the screen with a microfiber cloth, but it's just annoying because I have to do it once a month to get it off every time. Other than that, it's pretty, helps keep dust off the keyboard, and slightly helps my keys sound quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Tran

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great feel
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. The feel is good, it stays in place and the lettering is just perfect. I hope it stays that way for the longer run. The color is a little darker teal than the one depicted in the picture, but that's alright with me. The keyboard of the mac book just feels so much better. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B

customer_reviews.title: Protects my keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I like the ombre look, and how this clings to the keyboard, allowing easy typing. It's the perfect size for my MacBook Pro 13. My cat likes to sociably lie next to me as I work and alas, hairs kind of cling to the silicone. I find it's best to remove them with a small dry paint brush.
customer_reviews.author: MarileeTop Contributor: Weaving

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quickly and STRETCHES OUT
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard skin came faded in certain areas. I didn't mind it since I liked the colors and didn't want to go through the hassle of exchanging or returning. However, it's gotten to the point where it's very much so faded within only a couple months. The bigger issue is that it's STRETCHED OUT! The keyboard skin cover no longer fits because it's stretched out and doesn't fit over the keys! I've never had this issue with other covers.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a MacBook Pro 13 in. I have had this keyboard cover for a week and I love it. I previously had a cover from Mosiso and it was doing a weird bubble thing where it would not lay flat on the keys no matter how I laid it or pressed it. This cover however is an exact fit. It feels great and looks great. I will definitely be purchasing more colors as I like to switch things up once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard cover! The only reason I didn't give it the full 5 stars was because it came with a minor scuff on the 'enter' key. Nothing huge, but it's definitely there. And no, to all of the other people wondering, the letters do not line up with the lights on the keyboard display. I really didn't expect this to be perfect so it really doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: So I bought this awhile ago but have just now ...
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this awhile ago but have just now put it on my MacBook 12. It’s just slightly too big so it doesn’t line up very well. Next time I think I will skip the colors and just do plain clear since all I really wanted was some protection.
customer_reviews.author: Rylie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: love it so far! I'm not sure how long the color will stay on, but I'll update it once it starts to fade. Fits my MacBook Pro 13" no touchbar perfectly! It's a contour fit, so not much sliding around at all and doesn't mess with closing laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a nice looking keyboard protector that works well and is attractive. I have the rose gold mac and it looks nice on it. Seems to be of good quality, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mrozinski

customer_reviews.title: Good to a point
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the cover would not stay on the keyboard. It began to bubble up and deform and then it wouldn't fit as perfectly as it did when I first bought it.
customer_reviews.author: N/S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product-- but check your laptop specs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this-- SO SLIM and great ombre look. But, I am a dolt and didn't look closely enough at specs. It is NOT for an older Mac-- it's for 2016 and on. Even though I messed up, I still love this product. It's not gummy, clunky or too thick-- it's almost undetectable. Love it, but make sure you pay attention to the specs (like I didn't, LOL).
customer_reviews.author: Not In The Mood

customer_reviews.title: Reduces loud keys on laptop
customer_reviews.text: Had to return first one which was damaged in shipping. Second one is great. Helped reduce annoying loud key clicking on laptop. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CJD

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Blew Me Away
customer_reviews.text: Well, we didn't read the model number like idiots, and of course it didn't fit which is 100% our fault. Within a couple of hours of contacting them, they had a new one that *would* fit on the way, with absolutely ZERO hassle. Fantastic customer service, super impressed. As long as you've confirmed that this will fit your model number, don't hesitate to order this--great company, great service, great product.
customer_reviews.author: DJo

customer_reviews.title: ... of what other reviewers said - but mine is perfect! The cover fits nicely over the existing keys ...
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the keyboard wouldn't fit my new 12" MacBook or that it would make typing weird because of what other reviewers said - but mine is perfect! The cover fits nicely over the existing keys and I can barely tell a difference in the typing. My MacBook still closes completely and I love the way it looks on the keyboard. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Thomlison

customer_reviews.title: While I ordered the pad for the correct computer, ...
customer_reviews.text: While I ordered the pad for the correct computer, the top row of the key cover does not fit the size and configuration of those keys. The pad also rides up from the bottom row of keys. Disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaMD

customer_reviews.title: This is a Piece of Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This fits NO MacBook Pros between now and 2014 that I tried it on. I tried giving it to friends and they refused after trying to fit it on to there MacBook Pros. It’s a pretty piece of flappy rubber and not much more.
customer_reviews.author: ruthannewagner

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: These covers do a nice job of protecting the keyboard and feel nice when typing but unfortunately they are not durable. I am on my 4th one in 4 months. The 1st and 3rd colors wore off on the keys frequently used (see photo of spacebar wear) and the 2nd one tore on the function key. Would not recommend unless you want to keep replacing them every month
customer_reviews.author: KJH

customer_reviews.title: This cover fits & looks great. Just the right size & doesn't cover the ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits & looks great. Just the right size & doesn't cover the speakers. The cover doesn't feel bulky - have had no issues typing with it at all. I gave it a 4 * instead 5 because the one issue I have is that the caps lock light can't be seen - the opening for the light on the skin is not aligned properly. This is very annoying especially because I use my caps lock quite often.
customer_reviews.author: sv_in_Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good keyboard protector. The only downfall is that the backlighting for the keys does not show through the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Smartin3

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: We have bought multiple covers because they are such great quality. Pretty color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Us

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Mac keyboard perfectly and has held up well to all my typing. Plus, the color looks really nice! It can be a bit difficult to push through to type at first, but now that I've used it a few weeks my fingers are used to it haha
customer_reviews.author: natgirl9

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t not fit the MacBook Pro 12! And it costs too much to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Rev C

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: breddy gool!! hard to line up on keys perfectly which makes the keys hard to read but I've been typing for a long time so I know my way around a keyboard, only a minor flaw for a jazzed up keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Randy A. Cascino

customer_reviews.title: Great skin for MacBook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard skin is amazing! I am notorious for rubbing the letters off my keys due to aggressive typing, but this skin is great at protecting them! Additionally, it stays in place well, yet is easy to remove for cleaning. I am so glad I purchased this and would absolutely purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: a.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Makes typing so much easier for me and it’s gorgeous! Even got a mini mouse pad!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: The pop of color and the rubbery feel of the keys are nice and it doesn't inhibit typing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months now and it has met most of my expectations. It fits perfectly on my laptop and doesn't fall off unless you pull it off. The pop of color and the rubbery feel of the keys are nice and it doesn't inhibit typing. The lettering doesn't exactly match up with the actual keys but it is only noticeable when the backlight is on but it doesn't really bother me since I don't use the light anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color is exactly as described and fits the MBP 13 (without touchbar) pretty decent as well
customer_reviews.text: Mine came a little bent so I put it between two textbooks to try to flatten it out as much as possible. The color is exactly as described and fits the MBP 13 (without touchbar) pretty decent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price , the letters are not centralized with the ones on the keyboard so I’m not sure if they will light up at night , I will give an update on that . Other than that it looks great .
customer_reviews.author: Kcoll

customer_reviews.title: Really thin, fits perfectly, fingers still glide over ...
customer_reviews.text: Really thin, fits perfectly, fingers still glide over well. Haven't spilled anything yet, so not sure how protective it is. took away a star because the backlight barely shines through, which was the reason I purchased this brand. Pics show the comparison with the backlight of the keyboard at full brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Elena T

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this feels when I type, and I can still see some of the glow through the keys. On a computer this pricey, protecting the keyboard is a must! This fits perfectly and looks super cute! Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: is beautiful and very easy on the fingers
customer_reviews.text: It fits my keyboard perfectly, is beautiful and very easy on the fingers. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this over 3 months. The color is so pretty and I really like it. It fits exactly on the keyboard and it doesn't move or slide. But once you detach it, it kind of loses adhesion and some part will lift slightly like the photo. (But not a big problem!) I recommend not to detach it. Overall, it's great!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: ... and have since returned the item but I did love the color when I saw it
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally purchased the incorrect size for the keyboard and have since returned the item but I did love the color when I saw it. Really excited to get the proper size and sport it on my MacBook!

customer_reviews.title: I love these keyboard covers
customer_reviews.text: I love these keyboard covers. They only last about 6 - 8 months for me before I have to replace, but they really protect your key board, and they're cute.

customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this keyboard cover, but despite the fact that I cleaned my keyboard before applying, it does not adhere and will just fall off if you flip the Macbook over.

customer_reviews.title: Sliding issues
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at first but keeps sliding and no longer use

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This keyboard cover did not fit on my 13 inch MacBook Pro. It is misaligned on the keys and not the right size. I am dissapointed considering the details states it is designed for a MacBook Pro 13 inch.

customer_reviews.title: works and fits fine.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Good value

customer_reviews.title: I just got this and it is great quality and the colors are awesome

The customer service is also great -'I had a minor problem with the first order and had a response to my email in no time and a replacement within 2 days. I was really happy with the customer service and can't wait to use the cover on my laptop!

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, but not great!

customer_reviews.title: Best in a well-lit environment

This one was thick enough and fit the keyboard and was definitely worth the purchase. I have the rose gold laptop and I paired it with the purple ombré keyboard cover and it came out gorgeous.

product_meta.title: TOP CASE - Faded Ombre Series Keyboard Cover Silicone Skin Compatible with MacBook Pro 13 inch A1708 (No TouchBar) Release 2017 & 2016 / MacBook 12-inch Retina A1534 - Purple/Deep Purple
product_meta.description:
Size:MacBook 12" & Pro 13" A1708 (No TouchBar)| Color:Mix Purple

TopCase Ultra Slim Silicone Keyboard Cover


TOP CASE newly designed keyboard cover will just be the perfect fit for your laptop. It is made from high quality and long lasting silicone material that is durable for everyday use. The keyboard cover is designed to protect your laptop from liquid spills, dust, scratches and any other accidental mishaps that may damage your expensive and newly-bought laptop.

Design to fit ONLY:


2016 MacBook Pro 13-inch with Retina Display (No TouchBar) Model: A1708 -- Release October 2016
The New MacBook 12-inch with Retina Display Model: A1534 -- Release 2015

Case Compatible with :

2016 MacBook Pro 13-inch 

Model:A1708 (No TouchBar)
Release October 2016
MLUQ2LL/A , MLL42LL/A

The New MacBook 12" with Retina Display
Model: A1534
Newest Release Spring 2015
MF855LL/A, MF865LL/A
MK4M2LL/A, MK4N2LL/A
MJY32LL/A, MJY42LL/A

Case NOT Compatible with: 
European Keyboard Layout MacBook
Macbook White 13-Inch
Macbook Pro 13.3" with/without Retina Display
Macbook Air 13-Inch, 11-Inch
Macbook Pro 15-Inch with/without Retina Display





* The model number can be found on the bottom of your laptop in between the two hinges in the format AXXXX

* *Apple MacBook are registered trademarks of Apple, Inc. Products are Apple compatible and not endorsed by Apple, Inc.
feature_bullets: Latest keyboard cover designed to fit MacBook 12" with Retina Display, Model A1534 (2015 Release) / MacBook Pro 13 inch A1708 (No TouchBar) Release 2017 & 2016
Individually molded keys for perfect fit; all keys are preprinted with letters/numbers
Made from high quality silicone for comfort typing while protecting your laptop against any spills, dints, scratches and etc
Keyboard cover is ultra slim to allow closing of your laptop and for comfort typing
Comes with TOP CASE logo graphic mouse pad
